text: Amal Nasser el-Din (; 31 July 1928 - 9 February 2025) was an Israeli Druze writer and politician. He served as a member of the Knesset for Likud between 1977 and 1988. Nasser el-Din was born in Daliyat al-Karmel, Mandatory Palestine. Din died on 9 February 2025, at the age of 96. ==References== ==Other websites== * Amal Nasser el-Din Knesset webpage Category:1928 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Druze Category:Members of the Knesset Category:Likud politicians Category:Israeli-Arab people
title: Amal Nasser el-Din
